message: This is an open chat / forum to discuss all things Netflix

I'll start by sharing a tip: For the best instant streaming results get a fast Internet connection (I have Comcast's fastest option) and hookup your Roku box via cat 5 cable (I used a flat cable because I had to fish under my rug to get it into the living room). Before running the cable I connected via wifi and while it worked I do get better results with the cat 5 cable hookup.
I use the Xbox and connect with just a regular,cheap hdmi cable. Would the Apple tv work better?
